snippet: Anne Tyler’s new novel follows her formula of presenting a sad-sack fellow who is vaguely aware that his youthful dreams have eluded him, and adds a supernatural twist.
abstract: Michiko Kakutani reviews novel The Beginner's Goodbye by Anne Tyler.
lead_paragraph: Anne Tyler’s new novel follows her formula of presenting a sad-sack fellow who is vaguely aware that his youthful dreams have eluded him, and adds a supernatural twist.

headline.main: Haunted by Life, Haunted by Wife
headline.print_headline: Haunted by Life, Haunted by Wife
